body_text:
Right now the "Last Updated" column pulls data from recipe.last_updated, which makes sense, but probably isn't quite as useful as we want. For example, if a recipe that is enabled is automatically re-signed, then the last_updated field will be updated, but no changes will be visible in the control interface.
Instead, I think we should use the creation time of the most recent (approved?) revision for this column in the control interface. What do y'all think?

body:
Right now the "Last Updated" column pulls data from `recipe.last_updated`, which makes sense, but probably isn't quite as useful as we want. For example, if a recipe that is enabled is automatically re-signed, then the `last_updated` field will be updated, but no changes will be visible in the control interface.

Instead, I think we should use the creation time of the most recent (approved?) revision for this column in the control interface. What do y'all think?
